europeana:record.dc:title: Jahresbericht der Biologischen Station Lunz 1991-92_014 (1993)

Kowarc: Longitudional distribution of a microcrustacea community (first results). 48- 57. Jude M. Johann Waringer: Hydraulic measurements and distances travelled by drifting invertebrates in a calcareous mountain brook (Ritrodat-Lunz). 102- 110.
